content: The lift at Leichhardt North light rail stop is out of service. Do not use if the doors open.

urlText: Lift unavailable at Marion light rail stop
content:
The lift is not operating at Marion's light rail stop.
  • Use the platform at Hawthorne or the lift at Taverners Hill instead.
subtitle: Lift unavailable at Marion light rail stop

properties.smsText: Lift unavailable at Marion light rail stop
properties.speechText: The lift is not operating at Marion's light rail stop. Use the platform at Hawthorne or the lift at Taverners Hill instead. If you need help, please ask station staff.
